name: The cave of Alchemy
description:
A long time ago, Rubedo's Sanctuary was the place to teach new Alchemists the ways of the four elements, but an ancient evil corrupted the mind of Zhang Guo, and so he woke the dead from their graves.

Enter the cave and master the elements to defeat Zhang Guo and bring peace once again to Rubedo's Sactuary!

Download:

Download and extract all the content into the same folder.

Controls:

  • A / D: Move
  • Space / W: Jump
  • Mouse Button Left: Use element
  • Mouse Wheel: Change element
  • Tab / M: Open map
  • Esc: Pause game

Credits:

  • Lead game designer: Polanski
  • Lead programmer: Polanski
  • Lead 2D artist: Polanski
  • Music: cynicmusic, Brandon75689, SubspaceAudio
  • Sound effects: SubspaceAudio

Special thanks to the opengameart.org community for providing everything I couldn't do myself ❤️
